TopicTitle: Platform Enigma- an off topic chat thread.

Articles.Content:
*sews Leon back up. Removes syringe from a port in arm. Injects Leon*

Whaa...Whaaaa...Whaaa waaaaasss in thaaaaaaaaaaa....

Awww... *pout*

H-hey, don't make that face at me!

H-hey, don't make that face at me!

I will if it works... *flutters eyelashes*

Whaa...Whaaaa...Whaaa waaaaasss in thaaaaaaaaaaa....
you'll see some crazy stuff in a moment. Just wait it out while your blood regenerates.

No, its because we all know you to well. And I haven't seen that many blue women.
Well, okay, the only blue thing about me is the hair. Still, I'm far too unmuscular to successfully kidnap anyone, even if I really, really wanted to.

I will if it works... *flutters eyelashes*

I said s-stawwwwwwpppp it!

Well, okay, the only blue thing about me is the hair. Still, I'm far too unmuscular to successfully kidnap anyone, even if I really, really wanted to.

Who said that you needed muscles? Sedative and forklift.
or a rifle!
I would not be a good forklift operator. I'd rapidly escalate from kidnapping to manslaughter.

Well, okay, the only blue thing about me is the hair. Still, I'm far too unmuscular to successfully kidnap anyone, even if I really, really wanted to.

Oh wow, you have blue hair?

That is bitchin'!

I wanted to die my hair dark red. Like, really dark red. And not have it done badly by my friend either, I wanted it done professionally so it doesn't get all gross and messed up like most of the girls at my school.

Then I realised I have no money.

I would not be a good forklift operator. I'd rapidly escalate from kidnapping to manslaughter.

Then a helicopter with a pilot?
i don't need to dye my hair i already have the perfect hair colour (i wouldn't mind green highlights)

Then a helicopter with a pilot?

I'm the poilet.

Yeah, hair's dyed dark blue. Used to be it was only a blue emo bang, but when I got over that phase I missed the speshulness of the hair, so I just dyed it all a dark blue. Nowadays it's mostly to cover up all the premature gray. <.<

Just because you treat the hair yourself doesn't mean it's necessarily any worse than a professional would make it. Just need to read the instructions and do it a few times for the experience.

Yeah, hair's dyed dark blue. Used to be it was only a blue emo bang, but when I got over that phase I missed the speshulness of the hair, so I just dyed it all a dark blue. Nowadays it's mostly to cover up all the premature gray. <.<

Just because you treat the hair yourself doesn't mean it's necessarily any worse than a professional would make it. Just need to read the instructions and do it a few times for the experience.

I just didn't want to risk it, half the lassies at my school tried to die their's dark cherry red and they mucked it up so it was inconsistent and they stained their skin and the hair got damaged. We call those girls "Period-Heads" (Pr. Peeryud-Heed)
Mm, I know what you mean. Made several mistakes like that in the beginning myself too. Obviously, with everyone's hair messed up, it wasn't all that bad, but as an adult it's a big no. xD
Bitchin' (Fave phrase by the way, you'll see it a lot :L), just found a bag of Haribos in my messenger bag!
Just finished watching the startrek in which Spock time travels.

I just didn't want to risk it, half the lassies at my school tried to die their's dark cherry red and they mucked it up so it was inconsistent and they stained their skin and the hair got damaged. We call those girls "Period-Heads" (Pr. Peeryud-Heed)

I had a friend in high school who dyed her hair red and it came out looking like she'd dumped ketchup on her head. So, she got called Ketchup for the rest of the year.

I used to put just a dark red streak out one temple or the other. I miss doing that...

I had a friend in high school who dyed her hair red and it came out looking like she'd dumped ketchup on her head. So, she got called Ketchup for the rest of the year.

I used to put just a dark red streak out one temple or the other. I miss doing that...

Haha, that sounds like a fun nickname to have

If you miss your red streak, why not start doing it again?
haribos?
As a boy, I never really considered dying my hair. But as long as it looks natural (blue is NOT a natural hair color!), I guess it can look good on girls.
As a Cyborg. I don't give a damn about any of this.

O boy, I can't think about bleeding ... ooo no, no,noo..ahgh..... x_x
